Returns: an array of SmsMessages for the PDUs
Parameters: Intent: the intent to read from
getMessagesFromIntent(android.content.In.Description: Read the PDUs out of an @B_android#provider#Telephony#Sms#Intents#SMS_RECEIVED_ACTION_E@ or a @B_android#provider#Telephony#Sms#Intents#DATA_SMS_RECEIVED_ACTION_E@ intent.

ClassDesc: Contains constants for SMS related Intents that are broadcast.
